posts.post_title: T206 tougher backs HOFers, T205 HOFer and M101-2 for sale
posts.post_content:
The following are for sale, would also consider trades for Johnny Evers cards I don't have. Prices include shipping. Check or money order preferred although paypal is ok. [url]mhgt@embarqmail.com[/url] with any questions or to secure a card or cards.

Thanks
Mike
